Rooms.Name: The muddy sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in mud to your knees. This is not the kind of place
for a picnic. The muddy sewer stretches further into the south.

Rooms.Name: The muddy sewer junction
Rooms.Description:
The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the south. It looks as if 
no person has ever sat his foot here before. It's too muddy for that
anyway. The sewer leads north, south and east from here.

Rooms.Name: The mudhole
Rooms.Description:
You stand in mud all the way up to your thighs and it's not too 
comfortable since you are used to a somewhat different environment.
The sewer leads to the north of here. In the middle you can just make
out an enormous drainpipe leading down.

Rooms.Name: The Dark Pit
Rooms.Description:
You are standing by the edge of a dark pit that leads down into even
deeper darkness. >BWWAAADDRR< - The smell from down there is unbearable.
The sewer stretches into the darkness to the east.

Rooms.Name: The muddy sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a bend of the sewer pipe. It is very
dark around here and the mud is sticking to your legs, not very pleasant.
The pipe leads east and south from here.

Rooms.Name: The muddy sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in something that reminds you very much of porridge, this
has the advantage that it's not hot, it's rather cold actually. The pipe 
bends to the north and east.

Rooms.Name: The muddy sewer bend
Rooms.Description:
This isn't your idea of a place to stay too long. You're in up to your
knees in something that resembles mud, but you're not quite sure. The
bend in which you stand leads west and south.

Rooms.Name: A muddy intersection
Rooms.Description:
You have both your feet safely stuck in mud. It isn't the mud that's wrong
it's the smell, the sounds, the total darkness that surrounds you. Everything
here is so depressing. The pipe leads on with a trail of thick mud to the
north, east and south.

Rooms.Name: The Sewer Junction
Rooms.Description:
You stand in the middle of a huge junction of sewer pipes right under
what you'd think was an air shaft. The sewer pipes lead to the north,
south, east and west. It look quite impossible to force your way up.

Rooms.Name: A bend in sewer pipe
Rooms.Description:
You are in a bend in the sewer pipe. A strong smell seeps in from the north.
The sewer goes north and east.

Rooms.Name: The muddy sewer pipe
Rooms.Description:
You have entered a kind of tube intersection that leads south, west and east.
Your legs are covered in mud up to the knees. REAL yucky!

Rooms.Name: The bend in the Muddy sewer
Rooms.Description:
This is not your idea of a holiday. You stand in mud up to your knees.
It's absolutely inconceivable how all this mud could have been placed
here. The pipe leads to the west and south.

Rooms.Name: A MUDDY intersection
Rooms.Description:
You wouldn't want to know the true feeling of standing in this mud up to 
your hips. >BWAADR<. All that fills your mind right now is the dream of 
a hot bath. This is NOT very clean mud you know, remember you're in the
sewer! The pipes leads north, south and east.

Rooms.Name: Muddy sewer
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a bend of the pipe system of the sewer with mud up to your
thighs. Contemplating a higher level of existence here would be utterly
inappropriate, as the smell would keep any intelligent creature from even
thinking of anything but getting away from this foul end of the WORLD.
The bend goes from north to west.

Rooms.Name: The old well
Rooms.Description:
You are standing by an old and worn well from before this century. The sewer
leads to the east from here and the well leads down into darkness. Metal
bars implanted in the side of the well lead down as a ladder.

Rooms.Name: The ordinary bend
Rooms.Description:
You are in the middle of a bend in the pipe system of the sewer system, 
WHAT a place!!! The pipe leads to the south and the east.

Rooms.Name: The sewer junction
Rooms.Description: You are in a junction that leads north, west and south.

Rooms.Name: The ordinary junction
Rooms.Description:
This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet
here. The pipelines lead west, east and north.

Rooms.Name: A quiet pipe junction
Rooms.Description:
This is the kind of place to rest, though the smell could be a LOT better
than this. The sewer goes east, north and west from here.

Rooms.Name: The odd room with smooth walls
Rooms.Description:
As you enter you hear a loud click from one of the walls ... and you fall
and fall and fall ...  .  .  .  .
... And come to an abrupt end. THIS is strange indeed. There's an arched
entryway leading down.

Rooms.Name: The sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in mud up to your ankles. This is an intersection with 
sewer pipes leading east, south and west.

Rooms.Name: Another intersection
Rooms.Description:
You have never seen anything so BORING...This is an intersection with pipes
leading north, south and east.

Rooms.Name: A junction
Rooms.Description:
This one seems interesting, a big difference from all the other junctions.
It seems cleaner than the rest of them. Weird. Something that looks like 
an air shaft leads upwards, but it looks far too slippery to climb.
The pipes lead to the south, west and north.

Rooms.Name: The sewer junction
Rooms.Description: You stand in a junction of sewer pipes leading north, east and west.

Rooms.Name: The Triple Junction
Rooms.Description:
You stand in the middle of a huge junction of concrete sewer pipes. The 
pipes lead into three different directions : east, south and west.

Rooms.Name: The Quadruple Junction Under the Dump
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in something that reminds you of an entry to an ant hive.
There are enormous concrete pipes leading north, south, east and west. 
There's also a metal ladder built into the concrete wall leading up through
a layer of garbage.

Rooms.Name: A triple junction
Rooms.Description: You stand in a junction with pipes leading west, north and east.

Rooms.Name: A bend in the sewer pipe
Rooms.Description: You can look in two directions where the pipe leads : south and west.

Rooms.Name: The sewer pipe bend
Rooms.Description:
You can look in two different directions where the pipe goes : west and 
north.

Rooms.Name: The pit
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a section of a pipe that leads to a dead end. In the floor
there's a pit leading down. There are bars set in the side of the pit wall
functioning as a ladder.

Rooms.Name: The round room
Rooms.Description:
As you enter the room it starts rotating - at first slowly, later faster
and faster - You get totally confused as to where up and down are, but you are
certain that the doorway is in the opposite direction of what it was when
you entered. It now leads east. There was only this one exit.

Rooms.Name: The three way junction
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a junction of pipes that lead west, east and south.

Rooms.Name: The Sewer Store Room
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a small room lit by a single torch set in the wall. The only 
way out of here is to the north.

Rooms.Name: The Shaft
Rooms.Description:
You are standing by the edge of a deep, dark shaft leading down. A single
ladder is your tool to work your way down if you so wish. The sewer pipe
leads south from here.

Rooms.Name: The Sewer Entrance
Rooms.Description:
You stand in the middle of a pipe that leads from north to south. Above you
an air shaft leads up into sunlight. It seems totally impossible to go up
that way.

Rooms.Name: The junction going three ways
Rooms.Description:
You are in a passageway in the pipes of the sewer system leading north, east
and west.

Rooms.Name: The Sewer Room
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large room with chairs set in the walls. You have the
feeling of being watched. To the south there's an entry to a larger room.
The room is lit by five torches, also set in the walls. To the west there
is a doorway leading out to the sewers.

Rooms.Name: The Sewer room
Rooms.Description:
This is a Room with walls that glitters like gold though not quite like it.
This is strange as it looks as if the glitter lights the whole room. It
looks very bright. To the south the floor is covered with yucky water. The
North leads to sort of a Guard Room.

Rooms.Name: The Pool in the Sewer
Rooms.Description:
You stand in water to your waist.  To the north is the entrance to this room.
A single door leads east.

Rooms.Name: The Sewers
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a dead end of the sewer. The only way out is south.
You can see a shaft leading up but it looks too difficult to go up
that way.

Rooms.Name: The junction
Rooms.Description: You stand in a junction leading north, west and east.

Rooms.Name: The small room
Rooms.Description:
The only thing in this room of interest is a chair, and that's tight to the 
rock floor. A doorway leads south and another leads east into darkness.

Rooms.Name: The Sewer pipe
Rooms.Description:
You are in what reminds you of a foul sewer, as if you liked being here! 
You can see two exits leading either north or south.

Rooms.Name: The Grand Sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are in a Grand Sewer Pipe. This stretches toward the south. It's large 
indeed! A doorway leads to the east from here.

Rooms.Name: The South end of the Grand Pipe
Rooms.Description:
You stand in water to your knees. A doorway leads west from here. The Pipe
stretches north.

Rooms.Name: The Edge of The Water Sewer
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a room where half of the floor is covered in water. The water
leads east and a doorway leads west.

Rooms.Name: The Dark hallway
Rooms.Description:
You can't see much of this, even with a light. The hallway goes into a
passageway to the south. A doorway leads west.

Rooms.Name: The dark passageway
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The 
passageway seems to continue south and north.

Rooms.Name: The dark passageway
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.

Rooms.Name: The dark passageway
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.

Rooms.Name: The dark passageway
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue west and north. To the east there's water
covering the floor and that leads through an arched entry to a watery
sewer.

Rooms.Name: The Watery Sewer Bend
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to bend and lead south and west.

Rooms.Name: The Watery sewer
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

Rooms.Name: The Watery sewer
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

Rooms.Name: The Watery Sewer Junction
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead into a junction going south, north and east.

Rooms.Name: The Watery sewer
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

Rooms.Name: The Watery sewer junction
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead into a junction that goes north, south and east.

Rooms.Name: The Watery sewer
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.

Rooms.Name: The Watery sewer bend
Rooms.Description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to bend and lead west and north.

Rooms.Name: A ledge by the dark pool
Rooms.Description:
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop
down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness, 
mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops, 
like a waterfall, into the pool far down.

Rooms.Name: A ledge by the dark pool
Rooms.Description:
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop
down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops,
like a waterfall, into the pool far down. Under you there is a small fissure
in the rock. It seems big enough to contain a few people.

Rooms.Name: The fissure under the ledge
Rooms.Description:
This is a small fissure in the solid rock. Under you lies the deep dark pool.
The water trickles quietly down from the ledge above you. The water smells 
like the water in a sewer.

Rooms.Name: Under the mudhole
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a small room with a great big opening in the ceiling. From this
opening there's mud dripping down in large lumps. >YUCK<. You can smell the 
foul stench of the slimy sediment as you try not to get covered by the 
falling sludge. To the east there is an entryway leading out from here and 
it seems absolutely impossible to force the muddy descent.

Rooms.Name: Under the Dark Pit
Rooms.Description:
Nice place you found yourself. You stand in the middle of a room with only
two exits, Up and East. A tall ladder is left here so that you can climb
up through the Pit without the use of a rope.

Rooms.Name: A muddy bend in the sewer system
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in what looks like a bend in the pipe system of the
sewer. The 'floor' is covered completely by mud! This includes covering
your legs up to your knees as well. The pipe leads west and south.

Rooms.Name: A junction in the sewer pipes
Rooms.Description:
You stand in the middle of what looks like a triple junction of pipes
going east, west and north.

Rooms.Name: Down the old well
Rooms.Description:
You are dangling on the slippery sides of the old well leading down and up.
The only secure point here is the metal bars that are cemented into the 
sides, the ones that you cling frantically to so that you don't fall. Who
knows how deep this well is?

Rooms.Name: The northwestern corner of the ledge
Rooms.Description:
You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe, 
solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the east but not back
south. It seems that the ledge is too narrow to turn on so you'll have to
continue forward.

Rooms.Name: The narrow ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.

Rooms.Name: The narrow ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.

Rooms.Name: The narrow ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.

Rooms.Name: The narrow ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.

Rooms.Name: The southwestern corner of the ledge
Rooms.Description:
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the 
north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of Abyss of total 
darkness. The ledge seems to have an odd-looking edge here.

Rooms.Name: An odd intersection
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a rather odd intersection of pipes. The pipes actually don't
resemble pipes anymore. They look more like a real stone tunnel, or a
passageway hewn directly into the rock. The ways from here lead north, east
and west.

Rooms.Name: The narrow ledge going east to west
Rooms.Description:
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.

Rooms.Name: Mid-air
Rooms.Description:
You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of Merc Mud.
The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know.
With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 metres per second per second, you
are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the bottom will continue to
be a mystery. Bye Cruel World.
You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

Rooms.Name: The Broad ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are standing on a ledge that seems quite a lot larger than the rest 
of the ledges. This one leads to the west and the east, plus it has an exit
going to the south. Though you could jump into mid-air, but it probably 
wouldn't be such a good idea. The way south is in utter darkness.

Rooms.Name: The northeastern corner of the ledge
Rooms.Description:
You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe,
solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the west and leads south
from here into darkness.

Rooms.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

Rooms.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

Rooms.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

Rooms.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Rooms.Description:
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.
You also see a small opening to the east.

Rooms.Name: The southeastern corner of the ledge
Rooms.Description:
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the
north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of abyss of total
darkness.

Rooms.Name: Under the pit
Rooms.Description: You stand in a completely dark cavern leading west. The wall looks weird here.

Rooms.Name: Under The Shaft
Rooms.Description: A ladder leads up from here to the Shaft.  A small opening leads west from here.

Rooms.Name: The sewer line.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a narrow part of the sewer. Down the sewer continues and to the
north is the ledge.

Rooms.Name: The sewer pipe.
Rooms.Description:
You are in an odd sewer pipe You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as
from a gigantic rat. You can see some slimy water gently running down into
a sewer drain, and north the drain continues.

Rooms.Name: Mid-air
Rooms.Description:
You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of DikuMUD.
The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know.
With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 metres per second per second, you
are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the bottom will continue to
be a mystery. Bye Cruel World.
You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

Rooms.Name: The Edge of the Water
Rooms.Description:
The pool side is dimly lit up by your light. You can see absolutely nothing
else nearby. The darkness here seems enormously oppressive. The air is
damp and the rock on which you stand is slippery. The pool seems too dark 
to make anything clear. The rock can be climbed upwards from here.

Rooms.Name: The Treasury
Rooms.Description:
You are in a small but well equipped treasury.  You can see some writing on
the wall.  The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see.  You can
get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.

Rooms.Name: The inner Lair
Rooms.Description:
You are in a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls.  The floor is 
made from black stone.  In the western wall you see a large black stone door.

Rooms.Name: The Lair
Rooms.Description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce. To the north
are a wooden door.

Rooms.Name: The Lair
Rooms.Description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Rooms.Name: The Lair
Rooms.Description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Rooms.Name: The Lair
Rooms.Description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Rooms.Name: The lair.
Rooms.Description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Rooms.Name: The lair.
Rooms.Description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Rooms.Name: The lair entrance.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a dry part of the sewer. To the north is a wooden door, you 
can see some slime at the lower part of the door. You also see some skulls
and some broken bones.

Rooms.Name: The crawlway.
Rooms.Description: You are in a narrow crawlway.  You don't notice anything interesting here.

Rooms.Name: The four-way junction.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a sewer junction. To the north is a small hole, to the west is a
narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues.

Rooms.Name: The small cave.
Rooms.Description: You are in a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.

Rooms.Name: The sewer drain.
Rooms.Description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the north.

Rooms.Name: The sewer drain.
Rooms.Description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the east.

Rooms.Name: The drain end.
Rooms.Description:
You are at the end of the drain around you the sewer has collapsed, the only
exit is west.

Rooms.Name: The half-wet drain.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a sewer drain where the floor is covered with water. To the north
it looks more dry, south however the drain runs down into some water.

Rooms.Name: Under water in the sewer.
Rooms.Description:
You swim in some dirty water and is holding you breath. You'll better 
continue before you drown. It is a good thing that you can hold your light
above water-level.

Rooms.Name: The half-dry drain.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a half-dry sewer drain. To the north the drain runs a little bit
downwards into some water to the east you can see a small hole. To the west
you see another drain.

Rooms.Name: The very small room.
Rooms.Description: You are in a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting.

Rooms.Name: A dry sewer drain.
Rooms.Description: You are in a dry but dirty sewer drain. The drain continues east and south.

Rooms.Name: A boring drain.
Rooms.Description: You are in yet another sewer drain.

Rooms.Name: The sewer drain.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a sewer drain, there is nothing special in here, except for a 
loud echo.

Rooms.Name: The sewer drain.
Rooms.Description: You are in a drain, with some slimy water on the floor.

Rooms.Name: The sewer bend.
Rooms.Description: You find yourself in an ordinary sewer bend, which bend from west to north.

Rooms.Name: The sewer junction
Rooms.Description:
You stand in a junction of three sewer drains. You see some odd scratches on
the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.North and south the sewer continues 
as usual, but west it looks a little strange.

Rooms.Name: The sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are in a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole.
You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. There 
is a sewer drain south.

Rooms.Name: The strange sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are in a very strange sewer indeed, there are some odd scratches on the
pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. And you can see a lot of organic decay
like bones from animals AND humans. West the drain runs slightly upwards.

Rooms.Name: The damp sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are in a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the 
substance you see a lot of decay. You see some odd scratches on the wall, as
from a gigantic rat. Both to the east and west the pipe seems to run down.

Rooms.Name: The strange sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are in an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer wall,
ad a lot of debris on the floor.

Rooms.Name: The sewer
Rooms.Description:
You are in a sewer with more scratches on the walls. And of course a whole lot
of decay. The drain runs east and north.

Rooms.Name: The sewer drain
Rooms.Description:
You stand in in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-like
room. You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as from a gigantic rat. 
The sewer leads south.

Rooms.Name: The rat's lair
Rooms.Description:
You are in a little cave. You are able to see quite a lot of debris on the 
floor. There is a sewer drain west of here.

Rooms.Name: The Wall of the Abyss
Rooms.Description:
You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness. There's an exit 
leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again to do so.

Rooms.Name: The entrance.
Rooms.Description:
You are in a very dark room. You notice that some faces are  staring at you from
inside the walls. In the middle of the room  there is a small altar. To the
north there is a small round  door.

Rooms.Name: The corridor.
Rooms.Description:
The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue. You can hear wailing
through an open black hole to the east. To the south there is a round door.

Rooms.Name: The Realm of lost souls
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in nothing. All around you there are stars.
Sometimes a shadow flies closely by you, wailing very loudly. 
To the north there is a small bright hole. To the west there is 
a small red hole.

Rooms.Name: The T-crossing
Rooms.Description:
You are in a small hallway. There are doors to the east and to
the west. To the south there are a black hole. There is writing
in the wall. Wails can be heard from the south.

Rooms.Name: The firedeath
Rooms.Description:
This room is very hot. There are flames surrounding you.  You can
see no exits at all!  Skeletons are lying all over the floor.

Rooms.Name: The tortureroom.
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a middle of a square room. Along the walls skeletons 
are hanging in rusty chains. In the middle of the room there is a big metal 
box, covered with dust. To the south you can just make out a small exit.

Rooms.Name: The hells yard
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a lot of mud. A disgusting smell surrounds
the place, and makes you feel sick. Small flames sometimes shoot
up from the hot mud. To the west there is a small door. To the 
north you can see an iron door.

Rooms.Name: The Entrance to the Realm of silence
Rooms.Description:
This is an utterly silent place. As you look around you see that there
hasn't been a living thing in a long time. The dust lies here in a thick
layer on the floor and on the furniture. On the wall hangs a bleak and 
worn tapestry. A winding stone staircase leads up into darkness. On the 
wall to the west you can see a huge torch stuck into the solid rock.
A large portcullis blocks your way to the north.

Rooms.Name: On the walls of the Abyss
Rooms.Description:
You are clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to the ground
down below.  A large sign says : I haven't gotten any further ... Yet. But 
I'm pushing
to get finished with this sewer. 
Greetings and Good Health :)
Redferne The Gentle
This stops your journey down, the only exit is up.

Rooms.Name: Cave entrance
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in the cave entrance. It is very dark  down here. There is
writing at the wall. There is an exit  to the north. A stairway leads up.

Rooms.Name: Cave tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You are walking in a tunnel. It is very cold. You  can feel the presence of a
living thing ... SOMEWHERE.

Rooms.Name: Cave room
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a room. It's much cooler now.
The walls are glowing.

Rooms.Name: Cave T-cross
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a mud-like substance. The smell here is  awful, it is
rotten. To the west you can see some light.

Rooms.Name: Cave turning-point
Rooms.Description:
The mud are getting deeper. You are wondering, 'Would  it be an idea to leave,
before I disappear?'. To the  south you notice a flat round stone are blocking
the  way. To the west you can see mud.

Rooms.Name: The secret room
Rooms.Description:
There is dust all over the place. It looks like nobody  has been here for ages.
In the middle of the room you see  a socket with a crystal globe. The globe
glows with a  pulsing light. To the north you see a stone door. To the
south you see a grey block.

Rooms.Name: The mudhole
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a lot of mud. The mud goes to your  chest. You feel the
presence of something IN the mud.  The only obvious exit is to the west.

Rooms.Name: Tunnel
Rooms.Description:
The mud goes to your knees. Otherwise the tunnel looks
very normal.

Rooms.Name: The long tunnel
Rooms.Description:
Here There is almost no mud, as you stand at the top  of a small rock. Just
beside you there are a sign which  says 'WARNING! The worms are dangerous!'.

Rooms.Name: The hot room
Rooms.Description:
You are very surprised, as this room for a change are  hot instead of cold. To
the north it goes downwards into  some mud. There are also an exit to the west.

Rooms.Name: The small room
Rooms.Description:
As you look around you notice a small statue. There are  exits to the west and
to the east.

Rooms.Name: The stalagmite cave
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a stalagmite cave. Water is dripping  from the walls. It is
very cold in here.

Rooms.Name: The stalagmite tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You have entered a small tunnel. Here it is quite dry.  Maybe it would be an
idea to rest here.

Rooms.Name: The spongy room
Rooms.Description:
You definitely NOT like this area. It is very dank, and most
of the places it is wet.

Rooms.Name: The stalagmite T-cross
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a cross. To the north you can see  some light. Otherwise it
is dark.

Rooms.Name: The blind end room
Rooms.Description: This room is obviously a blind end. To the north you see  a primitive picture.

Rooms.Name: The treasure room
Rooms.Description:
This room is rich ornamented. The walls has carves showing  persons dancing
around a sun which is drawn at the floor. It  looks very old, and it is very
dusty. To the south you see a  secret door.

Rooms.Name: The square lair
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in the south-east part of the lair. You can
see a skeleton lying at the wall.

Rooms.Name: The square lair
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in the north-east part of the lair. You see
a sign at the wall

Rooms.Name: The square lair
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in the north-west part of the lair. Here's  another sign. There
are a exit from the lair to the north.

Rooms.Name: The lair end
Rooms.Description:
You can see a table in front of you. It's very dusty.  Around the table five
skeletons are siting. Exits are  north and east.

Rooms.Name: East tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east  and west. To the west you
see a wooden door.

Rooms.Name: North tunnel
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.

Rooms.Name: The L-shaped room.
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in deep darkness. To the south there is a small exit.
To the east you can see a gaping hole.

Rooms.Name: The Circular hall.
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in round hall. To the north, east and south you
can see a stone head hanging on the walls.

Rooms.Name: Dusty tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in dust. This place has not been  touched for a long time.
Otherwise it is quite boring  here, looks like a place to rest! To the west you
see  the outline of a door. A tunnel leads to the east.

Rooms.Name: The crossing
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a crossing of hallways. You can leave this place
in every direction, except up and down. In the dust you notice strange
footprints.

Rooms.Name: The L-shaped room
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a L-shaped room. You can hear noises from the long
tunnel to the east. You can feel fear! A sign is hanging on the wall.

Rooms.Name: Dragons lair
Rooms.Description:
You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red.  All kinds of bones
are scattered all over the floor.  On the walls you can see some burned
shapes.  You smell burned flesh.  Two creatures are melted into the floor.
You're next.

Rooms.Name: The burned room
Rooms.Description:
You are in a room, which once had been quite burned.  There is writing on the
wall.

Rooms.Name: The wind tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a tunnel. Above you, you can feel
a breeze.

Rooms.Name: The glittering room
Rooms.Description:
This room are all bright. In the walls you can see some  silver. Exits are:
West, east and south.

Rooms.Name: The secret passageroom
Rooms.Description:
You have entered a tiny room. There WAS an exit down, and an
exit to the west.

Rooms.Name: End of long tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You are at a end of a long tunnel. Right in front of you,  you can see a grey
mass. To the east you can see a tremendous  long tunnel, but you know that, you
has just been there.

Rooms.Name: Stair-room
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a small room. Drawings of faces in pain  are on the walls.
You can feel that darkness is ruling this place.  there are two exits: south and
down. You have a feeling the downward exit  isn't finished yet...

Rooms.Name: Dark tunnel
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a dark tunnel. It continues to the north
and to the south. Bones are spread on the floor

Rooms.Name: Entrance to lair
Rooms.Description:
The smell here is awful.  To the south you can see some smoke.
A tunnel leads north, and east.

Rooms.Name: North-eastern part of Basilisks cave
Rooms.Description:
It is hard to see here because of the smoke. To the north you
can see barely see a small tunnel. Other exits are to the south
and to the west.

Rooms.Name: South-eastern part of basilisks cave
Rooms.Description:
There are a very small hole in wall, from where the smoke  are coming from.
Otherwise it is pitch dark. Exits are north  and west.

Rooms.Name: North-western part of basilisks cave
Rooms.Description:
You can see some hay spread on the floor. The smell is awful here,
and it makes you feel sick.  The basilisk sleeps here.  Watch out ... Maybe it
is not far away.

Rooms.Name: South-western part of basilisks cave
Rooms.Description: You can see nothing but smoke.

Rooms.Name: The small cave
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in small cave. You can see  some light in the end. Exits are
north and south.

Rooms.Name: The northern end of the pool
Rooms.Description:
You have wet feet, you are standing in water. The water looks calm. You can
see that it's a big lake. Light seeps from the water.

Rooms.Name: The pool
Rooms.Description: You are swimming in water. It is getting deep here. It is dark in this end.

Rooms.Name: The south end of the pool
Rooms.Description: You standing in water up to you neck. You can only see water.

Rooms.Name: The pool
Rooms.Description:
You are swimming in DARKNESS. You feel something
touching your right leg.

Mobiles.LongDescription: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...
Mobiles.Description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling.
Mobiles.Description:
You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature,
though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there. The thought of arousing this
cruel creature doesn't seem appealing.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The huge hungry-looking sewer rat sits here.
The small hairy spider.
The giant mean-looking earth beetle crawls towards you.
The giant maggot crawls toward you.
The snake slithers towards you.
The evil wanderer stares at you.
Mobiles.Description: The evil wanderer is very thin.  He is dressed in a grey cloak.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The homonculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.
Mobiles.Description:
The Homonculus appears in a man-like form, about 18'' tall, it has a
greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a bat-like mouth, with
teeth gleaming yellow.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The chreffn are crawling here, looking around with their yellow eyes.
Mobiles.Description:
The head and torso of a chreffn is copper-covered, with yellow,
glowing eyes. The lower body is in an orange shading.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The morkoth is standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!
Mobiles.Description:
It's a five feet tall, shadow monster. The shape of this creature lies
somewhere between a human and a rat. It breaths very heavily, while staring
at you with such a glint in the eyes that reminds you of immense hunger.

Mobiles.LongDescription: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...
Mobiles.Description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The red fierce-looking dragon stares at you angrily.
Mobiles.Description:
The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you
arrives.  It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up ... Hsss', while
it moves closer.  'Can one NEVER sleep in peace ... Hsss'.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The sea hag is swimming around here.
Mobiles.Description:
The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you feel the deepest fear.
Big yellow eyes and sharp teeth.  Its ears are very big,
and it has small sharp horns.  It hates beauty.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The guardian naga looks kindly at you.
Mobiles.Description:
The naga are a snake-liked creature. She is covered in green-gold
scale with silvery triangles along her back. Her eyes are golden.
She notice that you look at her, and she says: 'Watch out. This way
leads to some evil creatures'.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The scaled basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
Mobiles.Description:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong
toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly. It's eyes are
glowing pale green.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The lemure blob slithers terribly precisely towards you for an attack!
Mobiles.Description:
This looks like a vaguely human blob. Big black yellow eyes, and a
mouth going a little bit out from the face. The lemure does not look
interested in you at all, but anyway it attacks. It looks like it's
mind has been burned out.

Mobiles.LongDescription: Jones 'Cruncher' the ettin is standing here glaring at you.
Mobiles.Description:
At the first sight you thought Jones was an orc, but when it came
closer you saw his second head. He wears an animal skin dress,
filthy and moth eaten. Jones really stinks...

Mobiles.LongDescription: Herald 'Mouse-Killer' the ettin is standing here looking confused at you.
Mobiles.Description:
When you look at Herald, you feel pity. His dress are really poor,
and the one of his heads hangs down. At the rope around his stomach
hangs dead mouses and rats. He does not smell good.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
Mobiles.Description:
It's a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now. In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
Mobiles.Description:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high. Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand. In the center of its head are four large
tentacles with very sharp points.

Mobiles.LongDescription: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
Mobiles.Description:
This mindflayer is six foot high. It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth. It has four small tentacles in the 
center of its head.

Mobiles.LongDescription: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
Mobiles.Description:
The wererat is about four foot tall. It looks very much like rat, except
that it is standing.

Mobiles.LongDescription: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
Mobiles.Description:
The gigantic rat is about ten foot long from head to tail and has claws
the size of your head looking very nasty.
